author: leif
msg: Add the basic beginnings of Instrument documentation.

author: crossley
msg: Add note to scan Roadmap and Status to find important issues for changes notes.
Add FIXME note about how to test the dist.

author: kentam
msg: Cleanup: delete unused code, add license to some files that were missing it.

author: leif
msg: Fix a problem where samples that had not been viewed or received any new values for some time were not being updated correctly before their state was saved.  This was making their hitory look incorrect when the state was later loaded.

author: crossley
msg: Have @class attribute in DTD for every tag, which enables the "extra-css"
section in the skinconf to be put to good use.
Updated all v1.2 DTDs to become v1.3 DTDs
and updated the v2.0a DTDs to become v2.0 DTDs.
Added demo of extra-css to the seed site and updated some sample docs to
